scripts.start: docker-compose up -d --build && for ((;;)); do curl -s http://localhost > /dev/null && break; sleep 1; done && yarn --cwd 'plugins' deploy
scripts.install: yarn --cwd 'api' install && yarn --cwd 'app' install && yarn --cwd 'db' install
scripts.test: cross-env CI=true yarn --cwd 'app' test && yarn --cwd 'api' test
scripts.lines: git ls-files | grep '\(.js\|.jsx\|.ts\|.tsx\|.scss\|.json\|.go\)$' | xargs cat | wc -l
